regulated_review.intended_use: Provide audit-friendly, reproducible validation evidence for NextStat outputs on a specific workspace and Apex2 master report.
regulated_review.scope: This report summarizes deterministic fingerprints, environment metadata, and Apex2 suite outcomes. It is not a substitute for full IQ/OQ/PQ documentation; it is an evidence artifact to support risk-based review workflows (e.g., GxP/CSA/SR 11-7).
limitations: This report does not include raw input data; only hashes, sizes, and summary statistics are included.
Validation results are only as complete as the Apex2 suites executed on the producing environment.
A 'pass' indicates suite-level parity/tolerance checks passed; it does not guarantee fitness for all intended uses.

notes: No raw workspace JSON is embedded in this report; only SHA-256 and byte size are recorded.
Observed data are summarized (min/max/total) without per-bin disclosure.

risk_based_assurance.risk: Numerical mismatch versus reference implementation (pyhf) for NLL and expected_data.
risk_based_assurance.mitigation: Apex2 pyhf parity suite with worst-case numeric deltas recorded.

risk_based_assurance.risk: Regression in golden-workspace behavior across versions.
risk_based_assurance.mitigation: Apex2 regression_golden suite summarizes case counts and pass/fail.

risk_based_assurance.risk: Loss of traceability and reproducibility across runs.
risk_based_assurance.mitigation: Deterministic mode omits timestamps/timings and uses stable ordering; inputs are fingerprinted by SHA-256.
